bug.short_desc: webtools seems to cause eclipse to fail to launch
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:
I first installed eclipse (sudo dnf install eclipse). I ran eclipse and it seemed to work fine. I then installed eclipse-webtools-webservices with dnf. I launched eclipse and it gave an error message pointing me to the .log file located within the selected workspace. I removed eclipse-webtools-webservices and eclipse again ran correctly.
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable):
Here is the output from dnf after my remove command mentioned in the above summary:
Removed: apache-commons-discovery.noarch 2:0.5-15.fc24 axis.noarch 1.4-28.fc24 eclipse-dtp.noarch 1.12.0-7.fc24 eclipse-gef.noarch 3.11.0-1.fc24 eclipse-webtools-common.noarch 3.8.1-1.fc24 eclipse-webtools-javaee.noarch 3.8.1-1.fc24 eclipse-webtools-servertools.noarch 3.8.1-1.fc24 eclipse-webtools-sourceediting.noarch 3.8.1-1.fc24 eclipse-xsd.noarch 2.12.0-1.fc24 hawtjni-runtime.noarch 1.10-6.fc24 jansi.noarch 1.11-10.fc24 jansi-native.x86_64 1.5-10.fc24 java_cup.noarch 1:0.11b-3.fc24 jaxen.noarch 1.1.6-8.fc24 jdom.noarch 1.1.3-10.fc24 jetty-webapp.noarch 9.3.7-2.v20160115.fc24 jetty-xml.noarch 9.3.7-2.v20160115.fc24 jline.noarch 2.13-2.fc24 json_simple.noarch 1.1.1-12.fc24 lpg-java-compat.noarch 1.1.0-19.fc24 rhino.noarch 1.7.7-3.fc24 uddi4j.noarch 2.0.5-12.fc24 wsdl4j.noarch 1.6.3-8.fc24 wsil4j.noarch 1.0-12.fc24
I believe this to be a similar problem to that reported in bug 1392150
